The organization will provide $2 million for “Cultural Evolution: How Art and Design Shape Our World” and the $1 million for a special exhibition dedicated to the work of American painter and sculptor Einar & Jan Skovgaard, which was organized by the Skovgaard Museum of Art in Oslo, Norway, and will be on view in the fall of 2020. “Cultural Evolution” is an exhibition organized by the Skovgaard Museum of Art in Oslo, Norway, and will feature works by five artists, including Jacob Heim, Tomi Østbye, Kjeldraal & Müller, and Luca Panza, and will aim to present the full range of American cultural heritage from 1966 to 2020. The twenty-first Biennial will be held at the Smithsonian American Art Museum in Washington, DC, in June of 2022.
